bibl.title: Faience Workshop in Ptolemaic Athribis (Tell Atrib) in the Nile Delta. Archaeological Evidence.
Études et Travaux (Studia i Prace). Travaux du Centre d'archéologie méditerranéenne de l'Académie Polonaise des Sciences

bibl.note: Significance of the faience material from Tell Atrib. - Faience wasters from Athribis. - Possible localization of the faience atelier in Ptolemaic Athribis.
